==Google Offers WikiMedia Hosting==
==Google Offers WikiMedia Hosting==
â
On [[February 11]], [[2005]], [http://news.com.com/Google+may+host+encyclopedia+project/2100-1038_3-5572744.html?tag=nefd.top news] [http://meta.wikimedia.org/wiki/Google_hosting] was released that discussions are in progress over the possibility of Google hosting a section of the [[WikiMedia|WikiMedia Foundation]]'s (Wikimedia) information on donated servers and internet transit. The early specifics of the offer indicated that no advertising (such as Google's [[AdWords]]) would be necessary on WikiMedia's projects. The two groups will hold a private IRC chat in [[March]] to further discuss possibilities.
+
On [[February 11]], [[2005]], [http://news.com.com/Google+may+host+encyclopedia+project/2100-1038_3-5572744.html?tag=nefd.top news] [http://meta.wikimedia.org/wiki/Google_hosting] was released that discussions are in progress over the possibility of Google hosting a section of the [[WikiMedia|WikiMedia Foundation]]'s (Wikimedia) information on donated servers and internet transit. The early specifics of the offer indicated that no advertising (such as Google's [[AdWords]]) would be necessary on WikiMedia's projects. The two groups will hold a private IRC chat in [[March]] to further discuss possibilities. As a result, some have coined the unofficial term [[Googlepedia]].
